actions.text: On agreeing to the Esty amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Esty amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Ms. Esty.

description: Amendment directs the Secretary to conduct a comprehensive assessment and management plan to restore aquatic ecosystems within the coastal waters of the Northeastern United States from the State of Virginia to the State of Maine, including associated bays, estuaries, and critical riverine areas.
purpose: Amendment directs the Secretary to conduct a comprehensive assessment and management plan to restore aquatic ecosystems within the coastal waters of the Northeastern United States from the State of Virginia to the State of Maine, including associated bays, estuaries, and critical riverine areas.
